name: Dark Pursuits
caption: Investigate the xenos artefact trade in Hive Desoleum and hunt a Daemonhost through the tunnels beneath Port Gyre.
description: The first act of the Desoleum trilogy. Trace the Faceless Trade from a mad noble's manse to the dark tunnels beneath Port Gyre, and confront a Daemonhost before the arch-heretek Somnius Halbrel can claim it.
